Text.Page:
Another surge of hostile creatures is threatening operations in Blessing Basin. I need you to kill {@LinkCreature:26#2006#tainted mycanars}, {@LinkCreature:26#3001#soulkeepers}, and {@LinkCreature:26#3002#hallowed sentinels} to protect federation citizens.

Report to Naerie when mission is complete.
Your efforts will make all of our lives safer. Thank you.
The {@LinkCreature:26#2006#tainted mycanars}, {@LinkCreature:26#3001#soulkeepers}, and {@LinkCreature:26#3002#hallowed sentinels} are an on-going threat. Consider yourself on retainer to slay them.
